definition: (idiom) up to the present/even now/now (in contrast with the past)/at this late hour
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Even now, raising cattle is still one of the  leading branches of economy.
sentences.chinese: 即使時至今日，畜牧業仍然是經濟的主要部門之一。

sentences.english: To date, but also as a rogue group singing the praises of the local community.
sentences.chinese: 時至今日，還要爲本土流氓集團歌功頌德。

sentences.english: Many years ago his home was a popular children's songs, is still clean up my mind today.
sentences.chinese: 多年前家鄉曾經流行的童謠，時至今日仍盪滌腦海。

sentences.english: ZZ: Ya, I still have the dream.
sentences.chinese: 對，時至今日，我依然懷有這個夢想。

sentences.english: In the present time, this concept is almost forgotten by the people of Earth.
sentences.chinese: 但時至今日，這個概念幾乎被地球上的人們所遺忘。

sentences.english: Today, more than 3 years, Hong Kong people have any good ideas ideas?
sentences.chinese: 時至今日，3年有餘，港人對此有何高招妙法？

sentences.english: Today, products are sold to over 90 countries.
sentences.chinese: 時至今日，優利德產品已暢銷全球九十多個國家。
時至今日，這些聚居區依然如故。

sentences.english: The prescription of crime of embezzlement is a great step in the criminal legislation.
sentences.chinese: 侵佔罪是一種古老且時至今日仍常見多發的犯罪。

sentences.english: Today China has stirred from its slumbers.
sentences.chinese: 時至今日，中國已從沉睡中醒來。

sentences.english: Yet in these times he might have done much worse.
sentences.chinese: 然則時至今日，也許更不像樣。

sentences.english: Both of these are now implemented in all browsers.
sentences.chinese: 而時至今日，各家瀏覽器都支持好這些特性了。

sentences.english: To date, no one has broken the record.
sentences.chinese: 時至今日，還沒有人打破這個記錄。

sentences.english: But today, joining the military has become an increasingly popular choice for students.
sentences.chinese: 然而時至今日，參軍入伍日漸成爲學生們的熱門選擇。

sentences.english: Today, the society is highly developed and the level of disguise also reaches a peak.
sentences.chinese: 時至今日，社會文明高度發達，僞飾也達到登峯造極。

sentences.english: Even to this day, I sometimes struggle with fear and perfection.
sentences.chinese: 時至今日，我有時還是會掙扎在害怕與完美主義之中。
